00021 using System;
00022 using System.IO;
00023 using System.Data;
00024 using System.Collections;
00025 
00026 using Niry;
00027 using Niry.Utils;
00028 using Niry.Database;
00029 
00030 using NyFolder;
00031 using NyFolder.Utils;
00032 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00033 
00034 namespace NyFolder.Plugins.BuddyList {
00035     public static class BuddyDb {
00036         // ============================================
00037         // PUBLIC Accounts Methods
00038         // ============================================
00040         public static string[] Accounts() {
00041             AccountsTable table = new AccountsTable();
00042             string[] accounts = table.GetAllAccounts();
00043             table.Dispose();
00044             return(accounts);
00045         }
00046 
00048         public static int AccountId (string username) {
00049             AccountsTable table = new AccountsTable();
00050             int id = table.GetUserId(username);
00051             table.Dispose();
00052             return(id);
00053         }
00054 
00056         public static string AccountPassword (int id) {
00057             AccountsTable table = new AccountsTable();
00058             string password = table.GetPassword(id);
00059             table.Dispose();
00060             return(password);
00061         }
00062 
00064         public static string AccountPassword (string username) {
00065             AccountsTable table = new AccountsTable();
00066             string password = table.GetPassword(username);
00067             table.Dispose();
00068             return(password);
00069         }
00070 
00072         public static void SetAccountPassword (int id, string password) {
00073             AccountsTable table = new AccountsTable();
00074             table.SetPassword(id, password);
00075             table.Dispose();
00076         }
00077 
00079         public static void SetAccountPassword (string username, string password) {
00080             AccountsTable table = new AccountsTable();
00081             table.SetPassword(username, password);
00082             table.Dispose();
00083         }
00084 
00086         public static int AddAccount (string username, string password) {
00087             AccountsTable table = new AccountsTable();
00088             int id = table.Insert(username, password);
00089             table.Dispose();
00090             return(id);
00091         }
00092 
00094         public static void RemoveAccount (int id) {
00095             AccountsTable table = new AccountsTable();
00096             table.Remove(id);
00097             table.Dispose();
00098         }
00099 
00101         public static void RemoveAccount (string username) {
00102             AccountsTable table = new AccountsTable();
00103             table.Remove(username);
00104             table.Dispose();
00105         }
00106 
00107         // ============================================
00108         // PUBLIC Users Methods
00109         // ============================================
00110         public static string[] AccountUsers (int id) {
00111             UsersTable table = new UsersTable();
00112             string[] users = table.GetAllUsers(id);
00113             table.Dispose();
00114             return(users);
00115         }
00116 
00117         public static string[] AccountAcceptedUsers (int id) {
00118             UsersTable table = new UsersTable();
00119             string[] users = table.GetAcceptedUsers(id);
00120             table.Dispose();
00121             return(users);
00122         }
00123 
00124         public static string[] AccountNotAcceptedUsers (int id) {
00125             UsersTable table = new UsersTable();
00126             string[] users = table.GetNotAcceptedUsers(id);
00127             table.Dispose();
00128             return(users);
00129         }
00130 
00131         public static void AddUser (int id, string username, bool accept) {
00132             UsersTable table = new UsersTable();
00133             table.Insert(id, username, accept);
00134             table.Dispose();
00135         }
00136 
00137         public static bool UserIsInList (int id, string username) {
00138             UsersTable table = new UsersTable();
00139             bool present = table.IsPresent(id, username);
00140             table.Dispose();
00141             return(present);
00142         }
00143 
00144         // ============================================
00145         // PUBLIC Accounts/Users Methods
00146         // ============================================
00147         public static string[] AccountUsers (string username) {
00148             return(AccountUsers(AccountId(username)));
00149         }
00150 
00151         public static string[] AccountAcceptedUsers (string username) {
00152             return(AccountAcceptedUsers(AccountId(username)));
00153         }
00154 
00155         public static string[] AccountNotAcceptedUsers (string username) {
00156             return(AccountNotAcceptedUsers(AccountId(username)));
00157         }
00158     }
00159 }
